channel.title: Overview of the Five Books: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Avi Geller
channel.itunes:summary: Take a tour through God's user guide for living. Learn about a few things that really matter to the Creator of this incredibly beautiful universe.
